name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 5070
description: Mainstream Blackwell GPU delivering exceptional 1440p performance with 12GB GDDR7. Features full DLSS 4.0 support and improved ray tracing cores for next-gen gaming.

reviews.review_text: Best price-to-performance GPU on the market right now.
Handles 1440p like a champ. DLSS makes it even better.
Great card for the price. Runs cool and quiet.
